component.text: Verifying OSPFv3 Protocol Settings for R2 and R3

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands: Verify the OSPFv3 protocol settings for R2.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "connected" 
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "ND" 
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "ospf 10" 
  Router ID 2.2.2.2 
  Number of areas: 1 normal, 0 stub, 0 nssa 
  Interfaces (Area 0): 
    Serial0/0/1 
    Serial0/0/0 
    GigabitEthernet0/0 
  Redistribution: 
    None 
R2#
command.instruction: You are now configuring router R3. Verify the OSPFv3 protocol settings for R3.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "connected" 
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "ND"
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "ospf 10"
  Router ID 3.3.3.3
  Number of areas: 1 normal, 0 stub, 0 nssa
  Interfaces (Area 0):
    Serial0/0/1
    Serial0/0/0
    GigabitEthernet0/0
  Redistribution:
    None
R3#
command.instruction: You successfully verified the OSPFv3 protocol settings.
